snippet.title: Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery Preview Trailer
snippet.description:
Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery is a Tactical RPG from Sunborn Network. Re-collapse is a remake of the original “Code Name: Bakery Girl” in 2013, which shares the same universe as Girls’ Frontline. The remake will dive deeper into the connection between Girls’ Frontline and Code Name Bakery, enriching the lore that the fans are fascinated with.

Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery is coming to PC, Nintendo Switch, and mobile. The game will have English, Japanese, Korean, traditional, and simplified Chinese localization options.

Wishlist on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1127700/Reverse_Collapse_Code_Name_Bakery/
